content.body: I'm confused, why someone want to change `() => x` to `x` ? They are totally different.
content.formatted_body: I'm confused, why someone want to change () => x to x ? They are totally different.

content.body: On the other side, people may want to remove `match` because `v` in `match(v) { if (x) {} if (y) else {} }` is never used, and may make mistake.
content.formatted_body: On the other side, people may want to remove match because v in match(v) { if (x) {} if (y) else {} } is never used, and may make mistake.

content.body: Oh, do u mean T.C.P? Yeah, it's a bit like it.
